content: That's really helpful, thanks! I'll definitely keep those tips in mind for my audition. I was thinking of preparing a monologue from "Hamlet" since I had a great experience volunteering backstage at a professional production of it a month ago. Do you think that's a good choice, or should I choose a monologue that's more related to the character I'm auditioning for in "A Midsummer Night's Dream"?
